duties_responsibilities.duty: Support Senior RF Engineers and/or RF Engineers in creating iDAS and Small Cell network designs.
Produce and document RF predictions and link budgets for design approvals.
Develop and maintain software proficiency with industry standard RF propagation modeling tools.
Directly responsible for updating system databases including Small Cell Geographic Information System (SCGIS) and Asset Management System (AMS).
Participate in field testing activities and analyze the results for customer documentation.
Assist with RF and fiber testing, reporting, and troubleshooting.
Review and approve various construction contractor provided field test results.
Develop a firm understanding of link budgets, noise figures, and intermodulation products.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering preferred, relevant military and/or industry experience may be considered
